headline: Cessna Citation Ascend Program Continues to Advance With Rollout of First Production Unit
summary: WICHITA, Kan., September 15, 2025--Textron Aviation Inc., a Textron Inc. (NYSE:TXT) company, today announced its Cessna Citation Ascend business jet program continues to advance as the first production unit rolled out of the manufacturing facility in Wichita, Kansas. The aircraft is expected to achieve certification from the Federal Aviation Administration later this year.

The aircraft is expected to achieve certification from the Federal Aviation Administration later this year.

thumbnail.caption: Cessna Citation Ascend program continues to advance with rollout of first production unit (Photo credit: Textron Aviation).

headline: Does Textron’s Recent Boeing EV Tiltrotor Win Signal Room for Further Share Gains?
summary: If you are wondering what to do with Textron stock right now, you are definitely not alone. The stock recently closed at $81.23 after a slightly bumpy week, down 1.8%, following a strong run of 3.0% over the past month. Year to date, investors have enjoyed a solid 7.2% climb. Even with a broader perspective, Textron has surged 27.1% in the last three years and 129% over five years, despite a dip of nearly 8% in the past twelve months as the market reconsiders risk across the industrials...
